thread.title: Trump son-in-law loses access to top briefing

title: Trump son-in-law loses access to top briefing
text:
Trump son-in-law loses access to top briefing Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:11 
U.S. President Donald Trump’s son-in-law and close adviser, Jared Kushner, has lost access to the most valued U.S. intelligence report, the President’s Daily Brief, as the White House imposes greater discipline on access to secrets, two U.S. officials familiar with the matter said on Tuesday. Tom Rowe reports.
